original: Larsson, Knut Harald, vattenrätts-ingenjör, civilingenjör, Vänersborg, f. 21/10/83 i Umeå av Jonas L. o. Maria Widelund, G, 16 m, Signe Norman, Barn: Gudrun f, 17, Birgit 18, Maj 22. — Mog:ex, 02, KTH 03-07. Bitr, h, chefen f, övre norra väg- o. vattenbyggn :drstr. 07-13, ing, v. Gideå & Husums A-B kraftv :byggn, 13-19, konsult, ing, inom vattenkraftsomr. i Umeå 19-30, väging, i Jämtl, k 30-32, vattenrättsing. i Västerbygd, vatten-domst. ’sed, 33. Var i Umeå bl. a, led. av elverksstyr., hamndir. o. drätsel-kamm. Medl. av Frimurarorden o. Rotarykl, RNO, RVO,
translated: Larsson, Knut Harald, water rights engineer, civil engineer, born on 21/10/83 in Umeå to Jonas L. and Maria Widelund. Married at the age of 16 to Signe Norman. Children: Gudrun, born in 17, Birgit in 18, Maj in 22. Divorced in 1902. Studied at KTH from 03-07. Assistant head of the upper northern road and water construction authority from 07-13. Engineer for Gideå & Husums A-B power station construction from 13-19. Consultant engineer specializing in hydropower in Umeå from 19-30. Involved in road construction in Jämtland from 30-32. Water rights engineer in Västerbygd, water court since 33. In Umeå, served as a member of the power plant board, harbor directorate, and finance committee. Member of the Freemason Order and Rotary Club. Awarded RNO (Royal Order of the North Star) and RVO (Royal Order of Vasa).

workExperience.description: Upper Northern Road and Water Construction Authority
Gideå & Husums A-B Power Station Construction

awards.name: Royal Order of the North Star
